subject: New Sales IM Testing Contest - $900 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

TopCoder is excited to announce a new Sales IM testing competition with $900 in prize money. The Sales IM Performance contest will focus on implementing test cases for performance testing the Sales IM application that is currently in assembly.  The Sales IM tool is a web based instant messaging application.

The winning submission in this competition will receive $600, while the second place team will receive $300. Contest details can be found here: 

http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=dev&d2=testing&d3=activeContests

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
